body.name: Upgrade Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, 52'' Long Handle, Standing Dustpan and Broom for Kitchen Office Lobby Floor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 46 mins
features: Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set: The broom and dustpan set for home is upgraded with a 52’’ long broom handle, no bend over, allows you to choose the appropriate length of the broom and dustpan set for comfortable cleaning.

Efficient and Extensive Cleaning: The newly designed 4-layer reinforced broom bristles are denser and more durable. Broom and dustpan set with long handle filter hair or dust layer by layer, effectively catching dust and dirt. Suitable for sweeping large areas and corners.

Convenient Storage & Save Space: The upright dustpan is kept open for easy emptying of trash. The lock design of the broom and dustpan set allows you to hang the broom and dustpan Set together on the wall or put it into the gap of the furnitures. It is very concealed, beautiful and space-saving!

Comb Design Dustpan: The broom with dustpan combo set has a comb tooth design, which is convenient to scrape the hair and debris on the broom into the standing dust pan and broom combo, no need to drag by hand, easy to clean human hair/pet hair and dust on the broom.

Flexible Rubber Lip: The rubber lip of the dustpan is flush with the floor, which conforms to clean all garbage and debris into dustpan, which can effectively and deeply cleaning, save your precious time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the v=broom get every little thing off the floor and the rakes on the dustpan hold all the little stuff and the dust on the bristles. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars all the way across is because the poles on the broom and the broom itself are always coming loose. The only solution I have come up with is to add glue to the inside and let it set. I have tried several times to tighten the poles but for some odd reason they always come loose. it is a great broom and dustpan. I just wish the poles held together better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: This is an effective design. Some other broom/dustbin combos I have used left some dirt under the dustbin lip. This one does not. Everything is made of plastic, so it is very light, but durability may suffer. For me, this will be kept outside, so it is a plus as it is replacing one with a metal handle that rusted out.Note: the colors in the picture are very inaccurate. The black is really a medium grey, and the red is far less saturated than in the picture. Still looks ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the broom I've needed for a while now. Sturdy, it's easy to assemble and disassemble, its bristles are good for sweeping. It doesn't feel as gross as other brooms tend to become.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Buy, Handy Set
reviews.reviewText: The quality is good and the price was reasonable. I’m replacing a set that is worn out. With two dogs, this is perfect for a quick sweep up to get up dog hair (etc.) from the hardwood and linoleum (or any hard surface) floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Very nice the little bars to get hair and fur off the broom are nice and thick, very use to use and plenty tall enough but light weight. I love the bucket to collect trash in very conveint

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the broom and dust pan combo; however for some reason my extension for the handle keeps coming out. I recently just glued it together as I’m 5’7 and need the extension - otherwise I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but short & flimsy
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’4” and this broom (even with the extension in place) is still short. Also the bristles are weak so the product does a less than stellar job of sweeping up messes. The dustpan is great though. Love the self cleaning comb portion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, FLUFFY broom!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this set up before, but this broom is much thicker, softer, and fluffier than any of the other brooms. The other ones were very rigid, and I think this one is more effective because it gets more junk off the floor, and it goes through the tines better.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality of the Product is good
reviews.reviewText: Nice product and quality also good.I ordered orange and black color but i received cream and brown combination.

I've been using the broom/dustpan unit for about a week. I read all the one star reviews before purchase as I usually do to determine if the pros outweighed the cons. It seemed so for this product, so I made the purchase, and can say that I have been very pleased.Things I like:1. Easy to assemble. All parts are bagged and tagged, so you know which parts are for the broom handle and which for the dust pan handle. Once put together it is all very sturdy, but not combersome.2. The handle of the dustpan will stay upright if you need two hands for the broom (I've dealt with other models where you must continually hold the dustpan handle or it crashes)3. Minor detail, but I do like that the pair clip together for storage and they do not take up a ton of room.Things I love:1. The finger like combs on the dustpan! Brilliant idea. We have large fuzzy dogs, and sweeping up dog hair is never a joy. Once I sweep up the dog hair, it makes it easy to get it off the brush and into the pan by combing through the broom bristles with the comb attached to the dustpan.2. On the lip of the dustpan that sits against the floor, there is a rubber edging that makes the dustpan sit flush against the floor, so all the sweepings go into the pan rather than slidding underneath.It's a great unit and one I would definitely reccomend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Height of pole is too low
reviews.reviewText: The pole high this too low. There is no optional rod included as mentioned l. Kindly have the optional rod send else it is if no use as it was purchased as I do not have to bend to clean the floor

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice product but colour not as shown
reviews.reviewText: I saw black and orange here, while a cream and brown colour one was delivered. Not a serious issue for me but I liked the dark colour better. Shows lack of customer understanding.
Great quality broom! Always good to have a great broom on hand like this one.
